constexpr index_type stride(rank_type i) const noexcept;
}}
Returns the stride of the mapping at a rank index {{c|i}}. Equivalent to {{c|return strides_[i];}}

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|i|a rank index in the range {{range|0|rank_}}}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
The stride at a specified rank index.
